articles.title: Rare old supernova found 20000 light years away – The Clare People - The Clare People
articles.description: Astronomers from the American Astronomical Society found a supernova remnant in a place far away from us, but still on the edge of the Milky Way. The object was named (SNR) G344.7-0.1 and is almost at
